testcase.name: Create User
testcase.system-out: * url karate.properties['baseURL'] ........................................ passed * def functions = call read('classpath:karate-config.js') ................. passed * def request_file_path = searchFileAndReturnContent('createUser.json') .. passed * def create_user_request = generateRequest(request_file_path) ............ passed * print create_user_request ............................................... passed Given path karate.properties['createuserpath'] ............................ passed And headers getmyheaders() ................................................ passed And request create_user_request ........................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * print response.id ....................................................... passed
